mapper.sql: proc_inst_id, proc_model_id, proc_def_id, proc_deploy_id, commit_time, committer, form_inst_all_value, status
mapper.insert: insert into as_proc_inst ( proc_inst_id, proc_model_id, proc_def_id, proc_deploy_id, commit_time, committer, form_inst_all_value ) values ( #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{procModelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{procDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{procDeployId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{committer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formInstAllValue,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update as_proc_inst
proc_model_id = #{procModelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proc_def_id = #{procDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
proc_deploy_id = #{procDeployId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
commit_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
committer = #{committer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
committer = #{formInstAllValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where proc_inst_id = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update as_proc_inst set proc_model_id = #{procModelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proc_def_id = #{procDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, proc_deploy_id = #{procDeployId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commit_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, committer = #{committer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, formInstAllValue = #{formInstAllValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where proc_inst_id = #{procInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
